snippet.title: Gameplay video for MIX/Monogame (Pre-alpha)
snippet.description:
Carrion is a reverse horror video game in which you assume the role of an undefined alien being.
Join our Discord server to get more frequent updates (and talk with the devs): https://discordapp.com/invite/phobia-game-studio
 
Carrion's Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/carrionofficial/

Lead dev's Twitter with some juicy gifs (including early WIP): https://twitter.com/kroskiewicz

Release date is TBA.

If you want to check out our previous game, BUTCHER, here's the link to BUTCHER's Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/474210

Enjoy!
